alert.note: Alert for Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 5:31PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm outflow winds will impact portions of southeastern Luna and southwestern Dona Ana Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 530 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles west of Afton to 14 miles southwest of Santa Teresa. Movement was west at 20 mph. A few isolated storms will develop behind the boundary, but most areas will not see any rain. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mount Riley, Camel Mountain and Kilbourne Hole. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin
